pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Exterior Calculus // Provides functionality for working with tensors, alternating forms, wedge products, Stokes's theorem, and related concepts from the exterior calculus. Uses 'disordR' discipline (Hankin, 2022, doi:10.48550/ARXIV.2210.03856). The canonical reference would be M. Spivak (1965, ISBN:0-8053-9021-9) "Calculus on Manifolds". To cite the package in publications please use Hankin (2022) doi:10.48550/ARXIV.2210.17008.
